semVer

Class SemVerAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • semVer.SemVerAnalyzer

  • public class SemVerAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object
    The SemVerAnalyzer program converts string input data into SemVer objects and then compares the given versions outputting a String indicating whether the first version nuumber come before, after, or is equal to the second version number.
    Since:
    2020-06-15
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Daniel Ricks

      • processArgs

        public void processArgs(java.lang.String[] args)
        Reads command line arguments passed to application and sets instance variables accordingly
        Parameters:
        args - the array of command line args passed to the application

      • analyze

        public java.lang.String analyze(java.lang.String[] args)
        Analyzes the versioning information passed in as a string based on the current status of instance flags. Will either read information from user input on the command line, specified file path, or directly passed in arguments and returns a string indicating whether the first version is equal to, before, or after the second version
        Parameters:
        args - an array of Strings indicating input flag information and a String in the format VERSION_NUMBER\\{whitespace\\}VERSION_NUMBER
        Returns:
        A string value representing the comparison of the first version to the second, will be one of: "before", "after", "equal", "invalid input"

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main class for SemVerAnalyzer. Will direct to either the instance analyze function if the teseting flag is false, otherwise, returns the value of the analyze method based on given input parameters.
        Parameters:
        args - an array of Strings indicating input flag information and a String in the format VERSION_NUMBER\\{whitespace\\}VERSION_NUMBER
